mapper.select: select t.topic_id, t.question, t.choice, t.photo, t.topic_type, t.correct_answer, t.score, t.difficulty, t.analysis, t.create_date, t.update_date from t_topic t left join exam_topic et on t.topic_id = et.topic_id where et.exam_id = #{examId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_topic(topic_id, question, choice, photo, topic_type, correct_answer, score, difficulty, analysis, create_date, update_date) values(#{topicName}, #{quesstion},#{choice}, #{photo}, #{topicType}, #{correctAnswer}, #{score}, #{difficulty}, #{analysis}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate})
